reviews.review_msg: Harvey teaches straight-up English. No bull. I find it annoying that so many English teachers use their classes as platforms for voicing their socio-political ideologies.

Matt is extremley fun, informative, and interesting.  Well versed and passionate about subject. Absolutely must do readings and homework, and memorize otherwise will not do well in the class. If you study can get an A.
Extremely entertaining; the class was so much fun!

Best english prof Ive had, possibly best overall. Makes lectures about old english actually fun (how many people can do that) and is super nice to his students. Not hard to get an A. Take his classes!
Matt is an absolutely amazing professor! He gives every opportunity to gain marks and to understand better. I would highly recommend him, I always look forward going to his class.
